item.description:
Ok, us opera lovers can't miss this one right after the candlelight concert:


Opera/Oratorio Ensemble Opera and Oratorio selections under the direction of Priscilla Gale.
Date: Saturday, November 22, 2008
Time: 08:00 PM -
Location: Memorial Chapel
Sponsor: Music Department


Admission: $5 General; $4 Seniors, Non-Wesleyan Students and Wesleyan Staff & Faculty; $4 Wesleyan Students


Event URL: Wesleyan Center for the Arts

For more information: 860-685-3355; boxoffice@wesleyan.edu

Come along for a nice, long evening of live performances!
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait at the entrance or you can call me 860-710-0300
item.name: Opera and Oratorio Ensemble
